Created an attachment (id=69184)
Suggested patch to solve this problem

Here's a suggested patch for this issue, which seems to be that even though adding problem markers doesn't seem to be an issue in the internal profile manager, refreshing/removing them is. I've moved the code that refreshes the problem markers for a given profile in the case of a profile change into the Data Source Explorer, assuming that if they're connecting/disconnecting from profiles in the UI and can see the Problems View, they should also have the DSE available. Not sure if this is a good assumption however.
Asking Rob to review the patch
